content: a simple and tailored pair of slippers to keep your feet cozy while relaxing around the house named for a favourite and peaceful vacation spot at the eastern end of lake ontario these slippers knit up quickly have a flexible length and include an optional edging that is easily customized the design requires a small amount of yarn so it s a great way to use up a lonely ball or skein of worsted weight you have in your collection pattern updated in march 2020 with three new sizes you can now choose between xs s m l which have finished foot circumferences of 7 8 9 9 75 / 17 75 20 25 22 75 24 75 cm if you have any questions/suggestions/mistake spotting please contact me thanks
